name: safe-dist-straight-curve-with-ceiling
description: Straight Curve with Ceiling - For Gnosis Safe
author: Praise

ceiling.description: The maximum amount of tokens that can be distributed in a single period.

cutoff.description: The point where the curve reaches the ceiling. If a period has more praise than the cutoff, the ceiling will be used as the period budget.

tokenType.description: The type of token that is being transferred. One of erc20, nft or native. NFT Tokens can be either ERC721 or ERC1155.

tokenAddress.description: The address of the token contract. If the token type is native, this field is ignored.

manualFilterAddress.description: Addresses to be filtered out of the receiver data. Defaults to the address of no_planet_b.
